name: ac7

stmt.origin: axaci(s1, wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wfn(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s1))))))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wfn(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s1)))))
-| wb(wac, wal(s1, wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wfn(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s1)))))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wfn(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s1)))))
-| wb(wac, wal(s1, wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wfn(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s1)))))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wac, wal(s1, wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wfn(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s1)))))))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wfn(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s1)))))

|- wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wfn(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s1)))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: An Axiom of Choice equivalent similar to the Axiom of Choice (first form) of [Enderton] p. 49. (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-2004.)
